title: XRP Ruling a ‘Landmark’ Judgment, Weakens SEC's Stance Against Crypto: Bernstein
description: The court’s decision weakens the SEC’s stance that the securities law is clear and no separate clarity is required for digital assets, the report said.

title: UK Lawmakers Propose Extending Online Safety Bill to Include the Metaverse
description: In a recent session of the UK Parliament, members of the House of Lords engaged in a lively discussion concerning the scope of the Online Safety Bill and its potential application to the metaverse. The lawmakers expressed concerns about protecting children and vulnerable individuals from harmful content that they may encounter in virtual environments. Many ... Read more

title: XRP Win Is A Win For All Crypto – New Ruling Stops SEC Going After Crypto Exchanges
description: A federal judge’s ruling in the Ripple case declares XRP as a security when sold to institutional investors but not to the general public. The ruling sets a precedent and limits the Securities and Exchange Commission’s jurisdiction over cryptocurrencies sold on exchanges. Visualizing the Trends A recent report by Bloomberg provides valuable insights into the [...]

title: BRICS Nations Gold-Backed Currency Emerges as Potential Dollar Rival but faces implementation challenges- Bitcoin in the Spotlight
description: The notion of creating a supranational currency poses a particularly complex challenge, as it necessitates agreement among a diverse range of parties. title: Top Analyst Says One Mid-Cap Altcoin on Cusp of Skyrocketing Higher, Updates Outlook on Ethereum and Litecoin
description:
